Sigh. This is how I installed and worked it.

1. Download.
2. Mount Installer using Daemon Tools
3. Select Language, Install.
4. To play, download Safe Disk 4 Hide.exe (Search on Google)
5. Rightclick the Daemon Tools icon.
6. Select "Emulation"
7. Click the Safe Disk 4 Hide Emulation option.
8. Turn on Safe Disk 4 Hide.exe
9. Press "Hide" on Safe Disk 4.exe
10. Play Game.
11. When done, press "Restore" on SD4.exe

That's it.

i don't get this, when i downloaded this i get a bunch of .rar and .iso and some system info. now what od i do. i tried de-raring the .rar files and the iso and then i get somethign like a VLC video file.. what do i do?
You need to have the code, the password, from the back of the manual...

FOR THOSE THAT NEED HELP:

Okay when you open the folder up, just select all of the files besides the NFO file. Extract. Then after there should be a folder rld-sofb. Now use DAEMON tools to mount the .cue file. Now to get the keys, open the NFO with notepad; keys are in here. And to open the cd, just go to computer and explore the mounted disc. Copy paste crack into C:\Program Files\EA GAMES\The Sims 2 Open For Business\TSBin
Works!
Thanks, it works great..

this is how i did it

1. extract
2. mount .cue image
3 install and use this key: P5PP-VWNV-AA5J-TWDL-L83V
4. go to computer and then to the sims 2 open for business and then go to crack and copy the file
5. go to c: drive; program files or program files (x86)
; EA games; sims 2 open for business; bin; paste and press copy and replace

that's it

Amazing pack when you're out of stuff to do, or bored with playing with your "Pets". This EP has the chance to go WILD if you add Seasons and Nightlife. I don't recommend on getting this EP if you got Apartment Life or FreeTime, though, you'll either have a hard time managing your Sims' life or the worst case scenario, DIE trying, just sayin!!! Anywho, for those who are in doubt of the functionality of this torrent, you're being ignorant.
I really am glad that these guys live to give all of us (the cheapmunks) this masterpiece! YAY to RELOADED! :)

Oh, btw, to get pass of the Update, there's NO way to get past it otherwise the installation will terminate itself. So, here's what I do.
I got PowerISO and Daemon both running. Mount this torrent's iso (after you downloaded it and unrar'd it OBVIOUSLY) with PowerISO, then Mount your Sims 2 base game's disc 4. That way, the installation will run without it asking you to "insert" the 4th disc.
And what's there to ask about it "NOT WORKING" if you DON'T have the base game?! Geez, that's the whole point of EXPANSION, it's solely made to EXPAND the BASE.
By "Mount your base game 4th disc" I mean Mount it with Daemon. So you'll have two ISO reading softwares running. If you got my procedures right, you'll have NO problem.
